text: Emanibhabe aneka musarekera drstite tadera upasyara santana hatyake susobhita kare diyeche yena tara taderake binasta kare deya ebam tadera dharmamatake tadera kache bibhranta kare deya. Yadi allaha ca'itena, tabe tara e kaja karata na. Ata'eba, apani taderake ebam tadera managara bulike parityaga karuna.
